titleInfo.title: Dude Ranch / NBC's Saturday Showcase - 1947-09-06 - Part 1

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: KVOO, Tulsa, OK radio program Dude Ranch, featuring the Sons Of The Range (including Cy Tuma) and Taudie Dalton (with pianist Bill Simon), with guests Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band (including Jimmy Hall). Originally broadcast 1947-09-06 (part 1), this episode was featured as part of NBC's Saturday Showcase series. Other personnel include announcer Johnny Ryan, producer Jim Randolph, and music supervisor Joe O'Neil.

subject.topic: Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe)
